briefdescription.para: Default clock for throttled log messages.
Whether to use Stanley controller (true) or PD controller (false).
Whether to use feedforward action for steering.
Whether to use path-based only feedforward action.
Time delay penalty for the path planner.
Average the new steering angle with the previous one.
maximum number of lap statistics to store.
Starting strip for the lap performance tracker in percentage.
Topic for publishing the look-ahead point.
Topic for publishing the nearest point on the path.
Topic for subscribing to odometry messages.
Topic for subscribing to pose messages.
Whether the raceline path has been obtained.
Whether the current speed has been obtained.
Whether the current pose has been obtained.
Whether the pure pursuit algorithm is enabled.
Current odometry pose of the vehicle.
Constructor for the PathFollowerNode. Initializes parameters, subscriptions, and publishers.
Callback to handle status updates for enabling/disabling pure pursuit.

parameterdescription.para: Message indicating whether pure pursuit is enabled.
Odometry message containing the current speed and pose.
Odometry message containing the current pose of the vehicle.
Message indicating whether to reset lap statistics.

briefdescription.para: Main control loop for the Pure Pursuit algorithm. Calculates target steering and speed, and sends control commands.
ROS2 node that implements the Pure Pursuit algorithm for controlling a vehicle along a raceline.
